name: Project Aim
description:
Description

Project Aim is a simple and lightweight aim trainer game for Windows, Linux, and macOS made with Godot Game Engine. Project Aim saves the user's best session score as a reference to see your progress when training your aim.


Features

• Crosshair Customization

• Target Customization

• Highscore System

• And many more...


Source Code

Project Aim is an open source project available at https://github.com/ahmadhayyan/project-aim.
